page.title: 09The Village Hall-Wolvey
page.content: On one side of the square in the centre of the village is the{VILLAGE {HALL.}This is the main centre of activities for the village. on the front wall of the Hall is a plaque which reads "Village Hall 1919". The Hall was built as a memorial to those killed in the{1914-19 WAR.} The Hall itself consists of a main hall with stage, kitchen, toilets and one or two smaller rooms. The Hallis used during the day by the playgroup and twice a week as a{ {DOCTOR'S SURGERY.}It is also used as a health clinic. Meetings are held by many{ORGANISATIONS}including Brownies,Guides,Badminton Club and Choral Society.Bingo sessions and whist drives take place during the winter months.The Hall is also used for functions such as wedding receptions and auctions.
